mapper.select: select (select expert_user.`name` from expert_user where expert_user.id=expert_recommend.expert_id)experName, expert_recommend.* from expert_recommend where expert_recommend.supplier_id=#{supplier_id} and expert_recommend.purchase_id=#{purchase_id}

SELECT (SELECT fy_quote.quote from fy_quote WHERE fy_purchase_detail.quote_id=fy_quote.id)quote, (SELECT bd_material.`name` FROM bd_material WHERE fy_purchase_detail.pk_material=bd_material.pk_material)material_name, (SELECT bd_material.materialspec FROM bd_material WHERE fy_purchase_detail.pk_material=bd_material.pk_material)materialspec, (SELECT bd_measdoc.`name` FROM bd_measdoc WHERE bd_measdoc.pk_measdoc=(SELECT bd_material.pk_measdoc FROM bd_material WHERE bd_material.pk_material=fy_purchase_detail.pk_material))unit, (SELECT bd_supplier.`name` FROM bd_supplier WHERE bd_supplier.pk_supplier=(SELECT fy_quote.pk_supplier_id FROM fy_quote WHERE fy_quote.id=fy_purchase_detail.quote_id))corp_name, fy_purchase_detail.* FROM fy_purchase_detail WHERE fy_purchase_detail.fy_purchase_id=#{PurchasId} and fy_purchase_detail.quote_id is not null

SELECT (SELECT fy_quote.quote from fy_quote WHERE fy_purchase_detail.quote_id=fy_quote.id)quote, (SELECT bd_material.`name` FROM bd_material WHERE fy_purchase_detail.pk_material=bd_material.pk_material)material_name, (SELECT bd_material.materialspec FROM bd_material WHERE fy_purchase_detail.pk_material=bd_material.pk_material)materialspec, (SELECT bd_measdoc.`name` FROM bd_measdoc WHERE bd_measdoc.pk_measdoc=(SELECT bd_material.pk_measdoc FROM bd_material WHERE bd_material.pk_material=fy_purchase_detail.pk_material))unit, (SELECT bd_supplier.`name` FROM bd_supplier WHERE bd_supplier.pk_supplier=(SELECT fy_quote.pk_supplier_id FROM fy_quote WHERE fy_quote.id=fy_purchase_detail.quote_id))corp_name, fy_purchase_detail.* FROM fy_purchase_detail WHERE fy_purchase_detail.fy_purchase_id=(SELECT fy_purchase.id FROM fy_purchase WHERE fy_purchase.id=#{PurchasId} AND fy_purchase.`status`='7')
